targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_application_load_balancer
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_elasticache_cluster
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_vpc
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_iam_user
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_cloudfront_distribution
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_s3_bucket

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN instance_state = 'running' THEN 'üü¢ Running'
    WHEN instance_state = 'stopped' THEN 'üî¥ Stopped'
    WHEN instance_state = 'pending' THEN 'üü° Pending'
    WHEN instance_state = 'stopping' THEN 'üü† Stopping'
    ELSE instance_state
  END as metric, 
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance 
GROUP BY instance_state
ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ec2.instance_id) as value
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance ec2
WHERE EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 
  FROM ${account_connection}.aws_vpc_security_group_rule sgr
  WHERE sgr.group_id = ANY(
    SELECT jsonb_array_elements_text(
      jsonb_path_query_array(ec2.security_groups, '$[*].GroupId')
    )
  )
  AND sgr.type = 'ingress' 
  AND sgr.from_port <= 22 
  AND sgr.to_port >= 22 
  AND sgr.cidr_ipv4 = '0.0.0.0/0'
)
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance WHERE tags = '{}'::jsonb OR tags->>'Name' IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance WHERE instance_state = 'stopped'

SELECT 
  instance_id,
  instance_type,
  instance_state,
  placement_availability_zone as az,
  CASE WHEN public_ip_address IS NOT NULL THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as public_ip,
  tags->>'Name' as name
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance 
ORDER BY instance_state, launch_time DESC
LIMIT 20
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_volume WHERE encrypted = false

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN backup_retention_period = 0 THEN '‚ùå Î∞±ÏóÖ ÏóÜÏùå'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 7 THEN 'üü° 1-7Ïùº'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 14 THEN 'üü† 8-14Ïùº'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 30 THEN 'üü¢ 15-30Ïùº'
    ELSE 'üîµ 30Ïùº+'
  END as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance 
WHERE backup_retention_period IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN backup_retention_period = 0 THEN '‚ùå Î∞±ÏóÖ ÏóÜÏùå'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 7 THEN 'üü° 1-7Ïùº'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 14 THEN 'üü† 8-14Ïùº'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 30 THEN 'üü¢ 15-30Ïùº'
    ELSE 'üîµ 30Ïùº+'
  END
ORDER BY MIN(backup_retention_period)
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance WHERE publicly_accessible = true
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance WHERE backup_retention_period = 0

SELECT 
  db_instance_identifier,
  engine,
  db_instance_class,
  db_instance_status,
  CASE WHEN publicly_accessible THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as public,
  backup_retention_period || ' days' as backup_retention,
  region
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance 
ORDER BY creation_time DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  v.vpc_id as metric,
  COUNT(s.subnet_id) as value
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_vpc v
LEFT JOIN ${account_connection}.aws_vpc_subnet s ON v.vpc_id = s.vpc_id
GROUP BY v.vpc_id
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_vpc_security_group
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_vpc_nat_gateway

SELECT 
  v.vpc_id,
  v.cidr_block,
  v.state,
  CASE WHEN v.is_default THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as is_default,
  COUNT(s.subnet_id) as subnet_count,
  v.region
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_vpc v
LEFT JOIN ${account_connection}.aws_vpc_subnet s ON v.vpc_id = s.vpc_id
GROUP BY v.vpc_id, v.cidr_block, v.state, v.is_default, v.region
ORDER BY subnet_count DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.description: ÌôúÏÑ± Ïï°ÏÑ∏Ïä§ ÌÇ§Í∞Ä ÏûàÎäî ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ïàò

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_iam_access_key WHERE status = 'Active'

panels.title: üîë ÌôúÏÑ± Ïï°ÏÑ∏Ïä§ ÌÇ§

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_iam_role
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_iam_policy

SELECT 
  u.name as user_name,
  u.create_date::date as created,
  CASE WHEN u.password_last_used IS NOT NULL THEN 'Console' ELSE 'API Only' END as access_type,
  u.password_last_used::date as last_console_login,
  COUNT(ak.access_key_id) as access_key_count
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_iam_user u
LEFT JOIN ${account_connection}.aws_iam_access_key ak ON u.name = ak.user_name AND ak.status = 'Active'
GROUP BY u.name, u.create_date, u.password_last_used
ORDER BY u.create_date DESC
LIMIT 15

panels.description: Ï¶âÏãú Ï°∞ÏπòÍ∞Ä ÌïÑÏöîÌïú Î≥¥Ïïà ÏúÑÌóò ÏöîÏÜåÎì§

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM (
  SELECT
    'EC2 Instance' as resource_type,
    instance_id as resource_id,
    'SSH Open to 0.0.0.0/0' as issue,
    'HIGH' as risk_level,
    region,
    placement_availability_zone as az
  FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance ec2
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM ${account_connection}.aws_vpc_security_group_rule sgr
    WHERE sgr.group_id = ANY(
      SELECT jsonb_array_elements_text(
        jsonb_path_query_array(ec2.security_groups, '$[*].GroupId')
      )
    )
    AND sgr.type = 'ingress' 
    AND sgr.from_port <= 22 
    AND sgr.to_port >= 22 
    AND sgr.cidr_ipv4 = '0.0.0.0/0'
  )

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 
    'RDS Instance' as resource_type,
    db_instance_identifier as resource_id,
    'Publicly Accessible' as issue,
    'HIGH' as risk_level,
    region,
    availability_zone as az
  FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance 
  WHERE publicly_accessible = true

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 
    'EBS Volume' as resource_type,
    volume_id as resource_id,
    'Not Encrypted' as issue,
    'MEDIUM' as risk_level,
    region,
    availability_zone as az
  FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_volume 
  WHERE encrypted = false

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 
    'S3 Bucket' as resource_type,
    name as resource_id,
    'Public Access Allowed' as issue,
    'HIGH' as risk_level,
    region,
    '' as az
  FROM ${account_connection}.aws_s3_bucket 
  WHERE block_public_acls = false OR block_public_policy = false
) security_risks
ORDER BY 
  CASE risk_level 
    WHEN 'HIGH' THEN 1 
    WHEN 'MEDIUM' THEN 2 
    WHEN 'LOW' THEN 3 
  END,
  resource_type
LIMIT 50

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT schema_name as __value, CASE WHEN schema_name = 'aws_estaid' THEN 'Account 1' WHEN schema_name = 'aws_test_fnf' THEN 'Account 2' ELSE schema_name END as __text FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name LIKE 'aws_%' AND schema_name != 'aws_compliance' ORDER BY schema_name
list.label: Account
list.name: account_connection
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT schema_name as __value, CASE WHEN schema_name = 'aws_estaid' THEN 'Account 1' WHEN schema_name = 'aws_test_fnf' THEN 'Account 2' ELSE schema_name END as __text FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name LIKE 'aws_%' AND schema_name != 'aws_compliance' ORDER BY schema_name
